analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 23.45. Sanidassanattika, Pītittika🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sani dassana ttika pī tittika  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Dhamma Paccanīyas in Direct Order, The Tikas on the Paṭṭhāna Sutta🔽With object, with happiness,🔽With object, impinging, not with happiness,🔽With object, impinging, not with happiness,

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With object, impinging, not with pleasure,

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With object, impinging, not with equanimity,
